page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: This area is quite isolated so people have to travel to the town if they want organised entertainment.At home they can watch television or listen to the radio. As many families live on farms the children get used to helping with the farmwork which means that they donÂ£t get too bored.However,the children have to entertain themselves in their spare time and as many families have large gardens they can play tennis and other sports. In the 1980Â£s horse riding has become very popular again.There is at least one house with new stables in G.R.0743, so this sport is available to the families in this area. A car is a necessity in this rural area and in a small survey it was discovered that very few people used the train even when going on longer journeys.
